CustomField.description: The two-letter country code, defined by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) ISO 3166-1 scheme, identifying the country in which the entity is located.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The two-letter country code, defined by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) ISO 3166-1 scheme, identifying the country in which the entity is located.
CustomField.label: ISO Alpha 2 Char Country Code
